multiplechoiceresponse.p: Why are stream pipelines good for managing continuous flows of data?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Pick one answer

choicegroup.choice: Because they batch up all of the data before performing any processing.
Because they can effectively produce results in near real-time.

div.p: Stream processing is ideal for near real-time data processing. It is, in this regard, the opposite of batch processing.
